title: Bankruptcy Auction of 2022 Isuzu NQR Flatbed Truck
item_description:
Bankruptcy Auction of 2022 Isuzu NQR Flatbed Truck- No Buyer's Premium!

Note: Subject to Bankruptcy Trustee Confirmation

Specifications

  • Year: 2022
  • Make: Isuzu
  • Model: NQR
  • VIN: JALE5W161N7303489
  • License: 52230H3
    • Registration Expiration: 8/31/2024
  • Odometer Reads: 38,076
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 19500 lbs
  • Engine: 5.2L L6 DIESEL
  • Body Style: Stake Side Truck
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 225/70R 19.5
  • Deck Length: 20’
  • Deck Width: 8’
  • Wall Height: 40”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Cloth
  • Interior Color: Gray

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once 1. the court order is received and 2. the title has been released by the lienholder, and 3. signed by the bankruptcy trustee. Please allow several weeks up to 3 months after the removal. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog or smog transfer fee, registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.
